old:
ああ、素晴らしきかな食事！
料理とはあらゆる素材と料理人の手が
織りなす究極のハーモニーなのだ！
column2:
Ah, a wonderful meal!
Cooking is the ultimate harmony of all ingredients and the cook's hands!
speaker: August

old:
珍しい食材について知っていたら
教えてくれたまえ
column2: If you know anything about rare ingredients, please tell me.
speaker: August

old:
ふむ――意外とあの魔物の肉は
焼いたらいけるかもしれんな
column2: Hmm... I wonder if that monster's meat could be cooked.
speaker: August
